SELECT ord.ord_id, prd.prd_nm, cli.cli_nm, ord.ord_cnt, NVL(ord.ord_add, '') || ' ' || NVL(ord.ord_da, '') AS ORD_ADDRESS, cd.det_nm, TO_CHAR(ord.ord_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORD_MOD_DATE FROM suju_order ord left JOIN client cli ON ord.cli_id = cli.cli_id left JOIN product_option opt ON ord.opt_id = opt.opt_id left JOIN product prd ON prd.prd_cd = opt.prd_cd left JOIN code_detail cd ON ord.ord_sts = cd.det_id
AND ( cli.cli_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR -- 거래처명 검색 prd.prd_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR -- 상품명 검색 prd.prd_cd LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' -- 상품코드도 검색에 포함 )
ORDER BY cd.det_sort asc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT cli_nm, cli_id FROM client
cli_type = 'BUYER'
AND LOWER(cli_nm) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY cli_nm OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT count(*) FROM client WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} and cli_type = 'BUYER'
SELECT cli_nm FROM client WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} and cli_type = 'BUYER' ORDER BY cli_nm

SELECT cli_nm, cli_id FROM ( SELECT cli.cli_nm,cli.cli_id, COUNT(suju.cli_id) AS order_count FROM client cli JOIN suju_order suju ON cli.cli_id = suju.cli_id WHERE cli.cli_type = 'BUYER' GROUP BY cli.cli_nm,cli.cli_id ORDER BY order_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT prd_nm, prd_cd FROM ( SELECT p.prd_nm, p.prd_cd, SUM(ord.ord_cnt) AS total_sales FROM product p JOIN product_option opt ON p.prd_cd = opt.prd_cd JOIN suju_order ord ON opt.opt_id = ord.opt_id GROUP BY p.prd_nm, p.prd_cd ORDER BY total_sales DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT prd_nm, prd_cd FROM product
AND LOWER(prd_nm) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY prd_nm
SELECT DISTINCT opt.opt_color, cd.det_nm FROM product_option opt LEFT JOIN code_detail cd ON cd.det_id = opt.opt_color WHERE prd_cd = #{prd_cd}

SELECT r.mat_id, r.mat_nm, NVL(s.stk_cnt, 0) AS current_stock, r.required_qty_total, r.required_qty_mine, (NVL(s.stk_cnt, 0) - r.required_qty_total) AS shortage FROM ( SELECT b.mat_id, m.mat_nm, SUM(b.bom_cnt * ord.ord_cnt) AS required_qty_existing, ( SELECT bom_cnt * #{ord_cnt} FROM bom b2 WHERE b2.opt_id = #{opt_id} AND b2.mat_id = b.mat_id ) AS required_qty_mine, SUM(b.bom_cnt * ord.ord_cnt) + ( SELECT bom_cnt * #{ord_cnt} FROM bom b2 WHERE b2.opt_id = #{opt_id} AND b2.mat_id = b.mat_id ) AS required_qty_total FROM suju_order ord JOIN bom b ON b.opt_id = ord.opt_id JOIN material m ON m.mat_id = b.mat_id WHERE ord.ord_sts IN ('ord_sts_00', 'ord_sts_01', 'ord_sts_02') GROUP BY b.mat_id, m.mat_nm ) r LEFT JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = r.mat_id AND s.stk_cat = 'stk_cat_02' WHERE (NVL(s.stk_cnt, 0) - r.required_qty_total) < 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suju_order(cli_id, emp_id, ord_reg_date, opt_id, ord_cnt, ord_end_date, ord_sts, ord_pc, ord_add, ord_da, ord_pay, ord_pay_date, ord_mod_date ,isapproval) VALUES(#{cli_id},#{emp_id},SYSDATE,#{opt_id},#{ord_cnt},#{ord_end_date},#{ord_sts},#{ord_pc},#{ord_add},#{ord_da},#{ord_pay},#{ord_pay_date},SYSDATE,'n')
